  • Constructor Details

    • AbsBoss

      public AbsBoss(int x, int y)
      Constructs a new AbsBoss object with given x and y position. This enemy is 64 cells wide and high and also has 20 health points The boss will also shoot 3 bullets like a shotgun and has a 50% chance of firing
      Parameters:
      x - The x position of the AbsEnemy.
      y - The y position of the AbsEnemy.

      Description copied from class: AbsEntity
      Abstract method to visualize the entity. Each subclass must implement this method.
